nodes.text: Eight for Aduba-3: The Saga of the Starhoppers
Eight for Aduba-3: The Saga of the Starhoppers was a holo-doc made by Tri-Nebula Entertainment on the events surrounding Han Solo's successful defense of the Onacra village on Aduba-3.
The holo-doc was their third feature on Han Solo and proved to be a moderate hit.

The Rebel Alliance historian Voren Na'al felt the holo-doc was so successful that the people of Aduba-3 had begun to believe it was totally factual. He felt this hindered his own efforts to uncover the actual events that took place there.
